about: Passionate Computer Science student focused on Front-End Development.
I specialize in building interactive and responsive user experiences with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. I thrive on learning new technologies to build efficient, user-friendly applications.
My philosophy: Great design combined with quality code creates outstanding products. Let's build something amazing.
